title: Netflix preparing all-cash offer for Warner Bros to fend off Paramount
description: Streaming service could convert terms for celebrated studio as Ellison-led rival appeals directly to shareholders
content: Streaming service could convert terms for celebrated studio as Ellison-led rival appeals directly to shareholders
